addons.name: Adblock Plus
addons.description: Надоела реклама? Тормозит интернет? Слишком много баннеров? Установи Adblock Plus, чтобы вернуть себе контроль над интернетом и видеть лишь то, что хочется.
addons.fullDescription:
Adblock Plus даст вам вернуть себе контроль над интернетом и видеть его таким, как хочется вам. Для расширения существует более сорока списков фильтров для десятков языков, которые автоматически настроят его для различных целей, от блокировки рекламы до блокировки всех известных опасных доменов. Adblock Plus также позволит вам добавлять собственные фильтры с помощью различных полезных инструментов, включая контекстное меню для блокировки картинок, ярлык для блокировки Flash-роликов и Java-апплетов и список элементов для удаления невидимых элементов (к примеру, скриптов или стилей).

Начиная с Adblock Plus 2.0 появилась возможность разрешить в настройках фильтров некоторую ненавязчивую рекламу. Таким образом можно поддержать страницы, которые не навязывают рекламу посетителям. Мы надеемся, что в результате больше страниц станет использовать ненавязчивую рекламу. Дополнительная информация

screenshots.caption: Easily remove all annoying ads from Firefox.
Adblock Plus can do more than adblocking. Enable powerful features in one click.
Clean up your Facebook experience with Adblock Plus.
Adblock Plus even removes those annoying 30-second video ads on YouTube.
Remove all annoying blinking banners!
Browse the web as it once used to be.
Please help us by reporting bugs.
You can even create your own blocking lists to customize the web to your exact needs.

addons.name: FlashGot Mass Downloader
addons.description: Download all the links, movies and audio clips of a page at the maximum speed with a single click, using the most popular, lightweight and reliable external download managers.
addons.fullDescription:
Download one link, selected links or all the links of a page together at the maximum speed with a single click, using the most popular, lightweight and reliable external download managers. The new "FlashGot Media" command grabs video and audio clips while they're playing, too. Supported download tools are dozens, see https://flashgot.net for details.

Features: https://flashgot.net/features
FAQ: https://flashgot.net/faq
Forum: https://flashgot.net/forum

screenshots.caption: Override Firefox built-in download manager
All the FlashGot menu items (you can hide any of them using Options)
General Options
Menu Options (hide rarely used menu items)
Build Gallery Dialog
All the FlashGot menu items (you can hide any of them)

addons.developerComments:
Since this is not a support forum, you won't receive any help here, while your question will likely disappear.

If you need support, please
1) read the FAQ: https://flashgot.net/faq
2) visit this forum: https://flashgot.net/forum
3) contact me directly: https://maone.net

You're welcome!

INSTALLATION ISSUES ARE COVERED BY FAQ 4.1, https://flashgot.net/faq#qa4_1

IF YOU'VE GOT TROUBLES DOWNLOADING HERE, please use the direct link here.

addons.name: Turn Off the Lights
addons.description: Затемняет содержимое веб-страницы для комфортного просмотра видео (как в кинотеатре).
addons.fullDescription:
Стоит щелкнуть мышью на кнопке с лампой, и страница затемнится. И видео автоматически окажется выделено. Повторный щелчок вернёт странице обычный вид.

Несколько замечательных возможностей в этом расширении:
✓ Включить свет обратно, нажав на него
✓ Поддержка нескольких видео сайтов: YouTube, видео HTML5,... и многое другое
✓ Настройка вашего YouTube: Авто HD, автоподстройка ширины,... и многое другое
✓? Скрытые функции:
Клавиша: T-> Вам нравится настоящий кинотеатр?
✓ Опция затемнения экрана, если пользователь нажимает на кнопку воспроизведения
✓ Опция включения/выключения эффектов приглушения и нарастания яркости
✓ Пользовательские цвета
✓ Опция обнаружения флэш
✓ Опция отображения уровня затемнения
✓ Опция защиты глаз ночью
✓ Опция атмосферного освещения
✓ Опция отображения тёмного слоя в верхней части окна
✓ Опция горячих клавиш:
Ctrl + Shift + L - вкл/выкл свет
ALT + F8 - восстановить значения непрозрачности по умолчанию
ALT + F9 - сохранить текущее значение непрозрачности
Alt + F10 - включить или отключить функцию защиты глаз
Alt + ↑ для увеличения непрозрачности
Alt + ↓ для уменьшения непрозрачности
Alt + * сделать индикаторы вкл/выкл на всех открытых вкладок
✓ Опция установки переключателя ночного режима
✓ и многое другое...

Расширение проекта:
http://code.google.com/p/turnoffthelights/

Информация о проекте:
http://www.stefanvd.net/project/turnoffthelights.htm

Для других удивительных новостей кино посетите мою страничку
↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓
╓────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
║ Не забудьте проголосовать и подписаться:
║ Facebook

Это расширение был протестировано и признано совместимым с популярными загрузками, связанными и не связанными с YouTube в магазине Chrome, такими, как как известные расширения для скачивания с YouTube (например, YouTube downloader, YouTube Repeater, YouTube mp3 converter, YouTube downloader и Video downloader), а также Evernote, AdBlock Plus, Hover Zoom, AddThis и другие расширения, работающие с текстами песен на YouTube.

Turn Off the Lights - не просто ночной режим. Он защищает зрение, предотвращает близорукость и регулирует яркость. Не забудьте поделиться со всеми этим расширением, Вы сможете найти кнопку Поделиться на странице опций. Для Google +, Facebook и Twitter.

Примечание: YouTube является торговой маркой компании Google Inc. Для использование этой торговой марки необходимы разрешения Google.

Then go to View > Toolbars > Customize in the menu. And drag the "Turn Off the Lights" addon to you toolbar.

addons.name: Download YouTube Videos as MP4
addons.description: An extension that adds direct links to download YouTube videos as MP4 and FLV. It has a simple interface and it downloads videos directly from YouTube. The extension integrates with YouTube's interface and adds a download button below the player.
addons.fullDescription:
UPDATE (November 14, 2014): Get the latest version (1.7.30), which fixes download issues. Thanks everyone for your bug reports and your patience.

Important: If you find bugs, use these debugging tips and send an email to deadline.support@gmail.com or create a new issue at github.com.

"Download YouTube Videos as MP4" adds a button to the YouTube video pages, so you can download videos. The download button is displayed below the video player and it looks like any other YouTube button. The extension doesn't include ads and only links to YouTube's download URLs.

How to use it? After installing the extension, go to YouTube.com and click a video. You'll notice a new "Download" button below the player. Click the button and you can select one of the formats that are available.


What are the download options?

Here are the formats you can download using this extension:

* MP4 360p (480x270, 480x360) - all videos are available in this format. Use it if you want to play videos on an old mobile phone (iPhone 3GS, HTC Desire, Samsung Galaxy S2) or to save space.
* MP4 720p (1280x720) - HD format, available for an increasing number of videos. Use this format if you want to play higher quality videos on a tablet, laptop or a phone with HD display.
* just in case you need it, you can also download the highest-quality FLV version available: FLV 240p (426x240).
* 480p and 1080p are no longer available as standalone videos downloaded from youtube.com. YouTube switched to adaptive streams and uses separate files for video and audio, which need to be merged to get a video file. This is more complicated and requires more advanced tools (ffmpeg), so I haven't added them yet.


How to watch the downloaded videos?

After downloading videos, you can play them using free applications like:
* VLC (Windows, Mac, Linux / play both MP4 and FLV videos) - recommended video player
* Windows Media Player 12 for Windows 7/8 (play only MP4 videos)
* iTunes and QuickTime Player (Windows, Mac / play only MP4 videos).

Using a different browser? The extension is based on a Greasemonkey script. If you use Chrome, Opera, Safari or Internet Explorer, install the userscript.


The extension works in:
* the regular YouTube interface
* the HTML5 experiment

Credits: The extension has been originally created by Arpit Kumar.

Send bug reports to deadline.support@gmail.com or create a new issue at github.com.

screenshots.caption: The download button in the new YouTube interface
Click the button to see the video formats that are available.
The download button in the new YouTube interface
The old download button.
The old download button.

addons.name: English (South African) Language Pack
addons.description: Adds South African English language support to the Firefox browser. All interfaces will be translated into South African English.
addons.fullDescription:
Translation of the Firefox user interface into South African English by http://translate.org.za.

If you find missing translations or incorrect translations then visit http://pootle.translate.org.za and please contribute a correction.

addons.name: Classic Theme Restorer (Customize UI)
addons.description:
Restore squared tabs, appmenu, add-ons bar, small button view and more for Firefox 29+ (Windows/MacOSX/Linux).

All builds & changelogs on versions page!
addons.fullDescription:
It is recommended to switch to a clean new profile to avoid UI issues after upgrading from Firefox 28 (and older) to Firefox 29 (and newer). Profile Switcher can help too.

Note: Triggering "Restore Defaults" in customizing mode to reset toolbar configuration is enough in most cases and much easier to perform.


This add-on restores squared tabs, the application button with application menu (known from Firefox for Windows), the add-on bar, bookmarks/history menu/sidebar buttons and other buttons. It moves star & feed buttons to urlbar, adds status bar item to the ui and allows many items to be movable. All features are fully optional. Some buttons have to be moved to toolbars manually using browsers 'customizing' mode.

##############################################

AVAST AV software,"Browser Cleanup" and disappearing Firefox add-ons

Current Avast versions offer a bugged version of "Browser Cleanup", which accidentally removes Firefox add-ons without any proper reason!
Although Avast is currently working on fixing this issues, it is highly recommended to remove or disable "Browser Cleanup" until problems are fixed.

Look at gHacks, Mozillazine, Bugzilla or Avast forums for more info.

##############################################


gHacks.net article (10 Reasons why you may want to try Firefox’s Classic Theme Restorer add-on)


Main features (on options window)

    Tab appearance: Squared classic tabs
    Tab appearance: Curved tabs (all colored and visible)
    Tabs not on top + [tabsontop="false/true"] attribute
    Tabs min/max-width settings
    Tab close on all tabs, active tab, toolbars start/end
    Custom colors for tab backgrounds, text and text shadow
    Application button on toolbars
    Application button on titlebar [Windows only]
    Own title for application button [Windows only] (CTR 1.2.6+)
    Custom application button colors
    Small navigation toolbar buttons
    Movable back-forward buttons
    Star button in urlbar
    RSS-Feed button in urlbar
    Movable status-bar panel
    Combine stop & reload buttons
    Hide urlbars stop & reload buttons
    Hide private browsing mask
    Findbar on top & at the bottom
    'Icons & Text' and 'Text only' modes
    Add [iconsize="large"]/[iconsize="small"] attributes to #nav-bar element
    Compact panel menus (bookmarks, history...)
    Green/blue site identity button for verified websites and secure connections
    Replace context icons with labels
    Add up to 20 additional toolbars
    Restore tabs empty favicon
    Replace generic favicon (empty and dotted) with sheet favicon
    Favicon in urlbars identity box (urlbars left)
    Different padlock icons
    Hide navigation toolbar
    Inverted (white) toolbar button icons
    Double click on tabs toolbar opens a 'new' tab [Windows only]
    Hide tabs toolbar with one visible tab
    Toolbar settings to alter colors, sizes, borders
    Disable some ui animations
    ...and more


Features (not on options window)

    Enable/disable 'Add-on Bar' (toolbar context menu)
    Toggle 'Add-on Bar' using 'Ctrl + /' btw. 'Cmd + /'
    Enable/disable 'Additional Toolbar' (toolbar context menu)
    Spaces, Flexible spaces, Separators
    Activity indicator on toolbars
    Bookmarks menu & sidebar buttons
    History menu & sidebar buttons
    Additional movable reload & stop buttons
    Movable urlbar container
    Movable (Firefox main) menu button
    Movable alltabs-button, webrtc-status-button, social-share-button
    ...and more


Squared tabs
Default 'curved tabs' can be optionally replaced with classic 'squared tabs'.
Tabs on MacOSX look more like Windows tabs with MacOSX colors on purpose.

Curved alternative tabs
All tabs are curved and use colours known from squared tabs.

Tabs 'not' on top
Simulates 'tabs.onTop=false' setting and moves tabs below navigation toolbar. On MacOSX tabs also get a 'reversed appearance'.

Application button / application menu settings

Application button on [Firefox] titlebar [Windows only]
The titlebar button is fixed on titlebars left like on Firefox since version 4.0. It is enabled by default on Windows systems.

Application button on toolbars
On toolbars the button appears like a default toolbar button.

Application button colours
On titlebar and tabs toolbar the application button can be orange, blue (Aurora), black (Nightly), blue (Palemoon), red, green and gray in normal browsing mode and purple in private browsing mode like on previous Firefox versions.

Note
The new appmenu is not an exact copy of the old one, but looks as original as possible. The 'splitmenu' will not be restored and the appmenu popup/submenus also miss some non-replicable menuitems.

Small navigation toolbar buttons
Navigation toolbar buttons get alternative margins and paddings to simulate old 'small icon view'.

Hide 'Navigation Toolbar'
Hiding navigation toolbar might be interesting after content got moved to other toolbars.

'Add-on Bar'
A toolbar at the bottom of the window. All movable buttons and items can be placed on it. Add-on bar can be enabled/disabled using toolbars context menu (right-click on a toolbar) or using 'Ctrl + /' (Windows/Linux) btw. 'Cmd + /' (MacOSX).

'Additional Toolbar'
A toolbar between navigation toolbar and bookmarks toolbar. It can be enabled/disabled using toolbars context menu (right-click on a toolbar).

Icons + text / text only mode
Simulates old icons + text / text modes where text was displayed below toolbar buttons or button icons got hidden.

Bookmarks menu button
A default 'menu button' which opens the 'classic' bookmarks menu. Positioned on bookmarks toolbar the button also displays its label.

Bookmarks and history sidebar buttons
Buttons which toggle bookmarks and history sidebar.

Back-forward, reload and stop buttons
Browsers default buttons got merged with urlbar and cannot be moved to different toolbar positions or to different toolbars. CTR adds duplicates of these buttons to the customization palette.

Combined reload-stop button
Place reload button AFTER stop button and enable the corresponding option on CTRs preference window. Hovering the option on preference window to get extra information.
Toolbar: [something]...[stop-button][reload-button]...[something]

Spaces, flexible spaces ans separators
These toolbar items appear in customizing mode and can be moved to toolbars like on previous Firefox versions.

Windows - Linux - MacOSX
This add-on was tested on Windows 7 (AeroBasic, AeroGlass, Classic) & 8(.1) & XP (Classic, Luna-Blue/Silver/Olive, Zune, Royale), Linux Mint KDE, Ubuntu and MacOSX 10.8/10.9. On other Systems or non OS-default themes tab colors may look wrong. Bookmarks, history, stop, reload, back and forward toolbar buttons use default OS icons (Firefox Windows icons on Windows systems, Firefox Mac icons on MacOSX and Firefox Linux icons on Linux systems).

Major problems with (discontinued?) Foxtab add-on
It is strongly recommended to remove Foxtab (v1.0-1.4.11) before installing Firefox 29 or newer, because it breaks Firefox ui for Fx29+. Using Foxtab with CTR breaks the ui even more.
If Foxtab is installed and the ui is corrupted, the add-ons manager has to be accessed via menubar (rightclick on a toolbar -> select menubar, Tools -> add-ons) and CTR and Foxtab have to be [u]both[/u] uninstalled. After a Firefox restart CTR can be reinstalled and will work properly.

Info, known 'issues', 'glitches'
1) Application menus 'cut', 'copy' and 'paste' buttons do not always work like they should.
2) Switching between AeroGlass and AeroBasic on Windows 7/Vista can change application buttons position, if the menubar is disabled. Maximizing/restoring browsers main window or restarting Firefox resolves the problem. This glitch is caused by Microsoft Windows and titlebars behavior and not by this add-on.
3) Entering and leaving customizing mode 'disables' rightclick menu items for bookmarks inside bookmarks menu button. A restart resolves this issue.
4) Tab colors on MacOSX fit to current ui instead of using Firefox 28 colors. This is intended and not a bug.
5) Do not install this add-on on pre-Australis Firefox (4-28). It is not intended to be used with older browser versions than 29.
6) This add-on was made for browsers default theme and will not work with all full/complete themes properly. However most Personas/LW-Themes) should work fine.

screenshots.caption: Main image: squared tabs + appmenu toolbar button on tabs toolbar [normal/private browsing]

Squared tabs + tabs not on top + small buttons + mov. back-forward & panelui buttons + Fx button + combined stop/reload + add-on bar + status-bar + feed&star-buttons + bookmarks- menu/sidebar buttons, separators & spaces + verified colors + different tabs toolbar + tab colors
Squared tabs + small buttons + movable back-forward & panelui button + Fx button + combined stop/reload + add-on bar + status-bar + star-button + bookmarks- menu/sidebar buttons, separators & spaces
Appmenu toolbar button on tabs toolbar + open appmenu (Windows 7, Linux Mint, Windows XP, MacOSX)
Preference window (v1.2.2+)
Toggled history sidebar button + appmenu toolbar button on tabs toolbar + open menubar (Windows 7, Linux Mint, Windows XP, MacOSX)
Tabs below nav-bar & personal toolbar, squared tabs, moveable PanelUI button + other buttons
Open bookmarks menu buttons popupmenu (Windows 7, Linux Mint, Windows XP, MacOSX)
Smaller toolbar buttons on navigation toolbar + application button on titlebar (Windows only)
Application titlebar button default and private browsing mode colors (Windows only)
Toolbar context menu

Context menu (optionally) deiconized
(1.2.5b5)
Controls in 'Customizing' mode

addons.name: NASA Night Launch
addons.description: Dark theme for Firefox. Inspired by the night launch of STS-116.
addons.fullDescription:
************************************************************

Help Support This Theme

2014-09-02: Hi everyone. Big changes in the software world, and I'm going to need your help to get the new software *and hardware* needed to keep developing this theme. See the details here, or just make a contribution right here and now on this page. It matters, and your support makes it possible. Thank you!

Welcome

This theme is for people who like it dark. If you're running a dark desktop, browsing at night, or just looking for a change, this is for you.

You can use this theme two ways:

1 - as a simple dark theme with a dark toolbar, which is how it is installed by default
2 - with your choice of NASA toolbar images, which you enable with a couple extra steps (see below)

News

- 2014-11-25: Now supporting Firefox 34
- 2014-10-02: Now supporting Firefox 33
- 2014-09-02: Now supporting Firefox 32
- 2014-07-19: Now supporting Firefox 31
- 2014-07-10: Now supporting Firefox 30
- 2014-06-22: Now supporting Firefox 29
- 2014-03-31: Australis work (for Firefox 29) in progress.
- 2014-02-24: Now supporting Firefox 28
- 2014-02-03: Now supporting Firefox 27
- 2013-12-10: Now supporting Firefox 26
- 2013-10-09: Now supporting Firefox 25
- 2013-09-13: Now supporting Firefox 24
- 2013-08-06: Now supporting Firefox 23
- 2013-06-18: Now supporting Firefox 22
- 2013-05-08: Now supporting Firefox 21
- 2013-03-27: Now supporting Firefox 20
- 2013-02-22: Now supporting Firefox 19
- 2012-12-28: Now supporting Firefox 18
- 2012-11-16: Now supporting Firefox 17
- 2012-09-27: Now supporting Firefox 16
- 2012-08-15: Now supporting Firefox 15
- 2012-06-27: Now supporting Firefox 14
- 2012-05-30: Now supporting Firefox 13
- 2012-04-30: Now supporting Firefox 12
- 2012-03-23: Now supporting Firefox 11
- 2012-01-30: Now supporting Firefox 10
- 2011-12-20: Now supporting Firefox 9
- 2011-11-08: Now supporting Firefox 8
- 2011-09-28: Now supporting Firefox 7
- 2011-09-15: Get the latest release sooner as a beta build!
- 2011-08-16: Now supporting Firefox 6
- 2011-06-21: Now supporting Firefox 5
- 2011-04-28: Now supporting Firefox 4 (Windows, Linux, and Mac)
- 2011-04-06: Now supporting Firefox 4 (Windows only; Linux and Mac to follow shortly)
- 2010-01-12: Now supporting Firefox 3.6
- 2009-06-30: Now supporting Firefox 3.5

Features

- Extension compatibility: compatible with a long list of Firefox extensions, including many of the most popular.
- Customization: add NASA background images and fine-tune the look of your toolbar. See the whole list.
- Desktop Integration: looks great on its own (for Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, OS X, and Linux) and with dark desktop themes, including Zune, Royale Noir and Silent Night.

Limitations

Every system has its limits. Here's ours.

- Some extensions need custom handling which we don't yet provide. Feel free to suggest enhancements on the NNL support forum.
- It's bigger than most themes because of the background images. (There's around 1MB of NASA images in the theme. This is simpler for people than having to download them separately.)
- Does not fully support Firefox in RTL (right-to-left) mode.
- Does not fully support OS X Retina High-DPI displays. The icons may be fuzzy, so just switch back to the Firefox default theme in that case.

Such is life. Per aspera ad astra. Enjoy your flight!
addons.eula:
Free for non-commercial personal use.

For modification and/or distribution, contact me first and see the file README.LICENSE.IMPORTANT.txt packaged inside the theme.

addons.name: friGate
addons.description: Открывает сайты, заблокировнные злым "админом" вашей компании, сети или провайдера. Недоступен Сайт? через прокси friGate откроет!
addons.fullDescription:
Без потери скорости, просто и надежно!

Бесперебойный доступ к вашим любимым сайтам!

Если есть вопросы или проблемы пишите тут http://forum.fri-gate.org
В отзывах не пишите - там НЕТ возможности отвечать на вопросы

Ставь уже сейчас и даже не заметишь случайной или ошибочной блокировки твоих привычных веб-сайтов!

Расширение проверяет доступен ли сайт из списка и если сайт не доступен то в браузере включается прокси и доступ к сайту осуществляется через прокси. Наши прокси не перегружены и созданы специально для нас, поэтому скорость доступа к сайтам через наши прокси практически не изменятся. При этом любой сайт из нашего списка всегда доступен, даже если провайдер случайно заблокировал его.

Внимание! Теперь доступны собственные списки сайтов. Добавляйте, редактируйте. Несколько алгоритмов проверки доступности или же постоянное подключение через наши бесплатные прокси каждого сайта отдельно.

Кстати, вы можете использовать свои прокси, указав их в настройках расширения.

Сайт можно добавить в глобальный список на http://fri-gate.org/

В чем наши преимущества:

1. мы используем свои собственные выделенные прокси и осуществляем балансировку нагрузки между ними с помощью нашего расширения;
2. если сайт не заблокирован то он идет мимо прокси что позволяет не нагружать прокси без необходимости;

Если вы заинтересованы в сотрудничестве – напишите нам – участие в нашем проекте совершенно бесплатно.

Terms & Privacy
http://fri-gate.org/ru/termsprivacy.html

screenshots.caption: Пример работы

addons.name: Simple White
addons.description:
Paint your firefox white. Make it look simpler, nicer.

Notice: For Firefox 34 users, please download the latest version 2.2.6.
addons.fullDescription:
Simple White is a theme that aims to simplify your Firefox's appearance. With semi-transparent tabs and simplified color scheme, Simple White provides you a clean and elegant style of using Firefox.

The new version 2.0 features a new icon set, which further refines the look and feel of the browser. In future updates, more existing icons will be remade to match the new minimal style.

simpler, nicer :)

For Firefox Beta users, please download the latest development version.
Source code is available on GitHub.
addons.developerComments:
For Firefox Beta users, please download the latest development version.

The source code for this project is available on GitHub.

addons.name: Send Tab to Device
addons.description: Send a tab or link to another device using Firefox Sync.
addons.fullDescription:
This add-on allows users of Firefox Sync to remotely open tabs on other Sync-connected devices.

To use this add-on, you must have Firefox Sync configured with two or more machines. Then, once Sync is initialized on Firefox startup, you should be able to right click on any link or anywhere inside a page and see an option to send it to another device. Just click the device you want to send to and the next time that device synchronizes with Firefox Sync, the link should open in a new tab!

This feature will eventually make its way into Firefox/Firefox Sync. Until it is officially ready, you can use this add-on. Once the feature is officially available in Firefox Sync, this add-on will automatically uninstall itself.

addons.name: Mozilla Firefox hotfix
addons.description: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues.
addons.fullDescription: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues. There is no need to install this add-on; starting in Firefox 11, it will be automatically installed. For more information, see: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Features/Desktop/Add-on_hotfix
